title: Dune Splicer
summaries: The Dune Splicer is a worm-type Hardmode enemy that spawns in the Underground Desert, or on the surface of the Desert during a Sandstorm. It is the Hardmode counterpart of the Tomb Crawler.

statistics.Environment: Underground Desert Sandstorm
statistics.Max Life: 500/1000/1500
statistics.Banner: [img:Dune Splicer Banner]Dune Splicer Banner
